title: Nora Shoes
subtitle: Originals
description: A new shoe for a new era, Nora Vasconcellos' colourful passion for family, progression and inclusivity manifest in her signature adidas Skateboarding shoe. Inspired by notable vintage classics from the adidas tennis archives, the Nora infuses an extended toe cap with double-layer durability, providing cupsole quality with a vulc aesthetic. The cushioned midsole adds to the shoe's stability and out-of-the-box fit without adding bulk or compromising boardfeel.

title: Ultraboost 22 GORE-TEX Shoes
subtitle: Men's Running
description: Don't let wet weather come between you and your run. These adidas running shoes are made with a breathable GORE-TEX membrane to keep feet dry and comfortable on rainy days. The midsole features hundreds of BOOST capsules fused together for incredible energy return to power you from start to finish no matter the distance — or the conditions.

title: Ultraboost 5.0 DNA Shoes
subtitle: Children Sportswear
description:
From class to training to bike rides with friends, kids never stop moving. These adidas running shoes keep them comfortable on their feet, whatever the day brings. They're equipped with all the performance technology that runners love, like energy-returning BOOST in the midsole and a foot-hugging adidas PRIMEKNIT upper.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

On top, a laceless Zone Skin upper includes discrete ribbed sections, each excelling at a different type of boot-to-ball contact. Underneath, a TPU outsole keeps you bossing things on dry natural grass. The adaptive adidas PRIMEKNIT collar locks you in while you establish control.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Performance, comfort and durability are the perfect trifecta for bike shoes. The Five Ten SLEUTH sets standards in all categories. Stealth Marathon rubber, combined with 5.10's Classic Dotty tread, is the benchmark for stickiness (friction) and performance. Comfort comes from an EVA midsole for excellent cushioning and serious pedal power. The upper's targeted blend of canvas and leather is designed for durability, with the bonus of a classically casual look.

Whether you are commuting to class, riding for fun, the Five Ten SLEUTH helps us all  be United By Summits. Consider the Five Ten SLEUTH your all-day companion, on and off the bike.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather and canvas upper; EVA midsole; Non-marking Stealth® Marathon rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Carbon / Wonder White; Product code: GY5214
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Gum M2

The Dame Certified Shoes from adidas Basketball build on Dame D.O.L.LA.'s legacy. They feature a lightweight Bounce midsole for elevated cushioning, a breathable upper that keeps the air flowing and all the signature details that celebrate the greatness of Damian Lillard.

description:
There's no bad time for these adidas by Stella McCartney slides, and with the minimalist, sophisticated design, there's no bad place for them either. All about ease, they bring comfort to all moments of the day. Thank the Cloudfoam footbed for that. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Adjustable hook-and-loop strap closure; Textile upper; Cloudfoam footbed; Bio-based EVA midsole made with 10% algae content, derived from freshwater algae; Synthetic outsole; adidas by Stella McCartney logo; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic  and 50% recycled polyester / Vegan alternative; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Cloud White; Product code: GX3122
colors: Semi Impact Orange / Semi Impact Orange / Off White
